Selective coverage
This is done to achieve greater effectiveness at the least
cost.  Specific strategies and activities are directed to thevulnerable population.
The characteristics of the vulnerable population should be
identified.  Susceptible individuals are often differentiatedfrom the rest of the population by location, age, biologicalattributes, surrounding social conditions, cultural and religiouspractices, etc.
